dct_title_s: Sketch of the Battle of Hobkirks Hill, near Camden, on the 25th April, 1781
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Appears in Charles Stedman's The history of the origin, progress, and termination of the American War. 1794. v. 2.
"Engraved for Stedmans History of the American War, Feb:6th. 1794" in lower center.
